nodes.text: The Yordain Core was a location where an event happened, involving a blessing by a priest-king. Around 5 ABY, Zab, a sergeant in the New Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry, saw an incident on the planet Catadra which reminded him of the event at the Yordain Core. He told this in a conversation with other New Republic personnel on the planet Troithe after, telling the story of the priest-king's blessing.
The Yordain Core was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
